name: api_input_TouchPhase
description: Describes phase of a finger touch.

properties.name: Moved
properties.description: A finger moved on the screen.

properties.name: Stationary
properties.description: A finger is touching the screen but hasn't moved.

properties.name: Ended
properties.description: A finger was lifted from the screen. This is the final phase of a touch.

properties.name: Canceled
properties.description: The system cancelled tracking for the touch.
